query: SELECT id, case_number, category, first_name, last_name, email, phone, description, created_at FROM cases WHERE first_name LIKE '%Jamario%' OR last_name LIKE '%Ford%' OR email LIKE '%jamario%' OR email LIKE '%ford%' LIMIT 10;
